entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 2:48 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: S 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 19.
